    • Method Detail

      • setScore

        public EventMention.Builder setScore(float score)
        Specified the score of the EventMention to be built. If not specified, will be Optional.absent().

      • addArguments

        public EventMention.Builder addArguments(Iterable<EventMentionArgument> arguments)
        Parameters:
        arguments - May not be or contain null. May be empty. All must have the same event type as this.
        Returns:

      • addArgument

        public EventMention.Builder addArgument(EventMentionArgument argument)
        Parameters:
        argument - May not be null. Must have the same event type as this.

      • setProvenance

        public EventMention.Builder setProvenance(EventText provenance)
        Specified the provenance of the EventMention to be built. If not specified, will be Optional.absent(). If the event type of provenance does not match the event type of the builder, an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        provenance - May not be null.

      • setAttributes

        public EventMention.Builder setAttributes(Map<? extends IType,Float> attributes)
        Adds the specified scored attributes. Beware that attempting to set the same attribute twice, even to the same value, will raise an IllegalArgumentException when build() is called.
        Parameters:
        attributes -
        Returns:

      • addAttribute

        public EventMention.Builder addAttribute(IType attribute,
                                         float score)
        Adds the specified scored attribute. Beware that attempting to set the same attribute twice, even to the same value, will raise an IllegalArgumentException when build() is called.

      • build

        public EventMention build()
